ygData.subject: Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you there. I can see losing the exp, but I hate trying to find my corpse and get all my gear back. I got slapped last night by Choon (which conned
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you there. I can see losing the exp, but I hate trying
to find my corpse and get all my gear back. I got slapped last night
by Choon (which conned white to me) so I thought I could kill him.
Died about a minute later and paid heck trying to find my corpse.

> Definitely I would get rid of the corpse-hunting. I understand
losing exp
> when you die, I think that's a good thing (well not GOOD but it
makes sense) but
> going back to find your body to get all your stuff back just sucks.
Especially
> when you die somewhere you can't get back to. WHY can't you ever
find a necro
> when you need one?
>
>
> "Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
